46476.「キハダさんっ。まだ 間に合います。\n やめるなんて言わずに もう一度\n 考:
Kihada! It's not too late. Don't say you're
quitting, but please reconsider!

46477.「げーっ また来たのかよ アンタ……。\n うるせえなぁ。おれっちは\n もう:
You're here again, aren't you... Shut up! I
have no interest in being a woodworker
anymore!

46478.「郷里のお母さまが ご病気で\n お金が必要だったのは わかります……。:
I understand that your mother back home was
ill and needed money...

46479.「でも うちに入門するとき 世界一の\n 木工職人になって お城に 家具を献上す:
But when you first came to us, you said you dreamed of becoming the world's best woodworker and presenting furniture to the
castle!

46480.「よう 邪魔するぜ キハダさん。\n 金が返せねぇなら もういいかげん\n こっ:
Hey, Kihada, you're in my way. If you can't
return the money, why don't you just leave
your body here already?

46481.「うっ！ デュバルさん……。\n わかりました……。今 行きます。: Ugh! Mr. Duval... okay... I'm coming.

46482.「待って！ あなたたちは どなたです？\n うちの職人を どこへ連れていく気です:
Wait! Who are you people? Where are you taking
our craftsmen?

46483.「もう いいんだ カンナさん……。\n 夢じゃ 食っていけねぇんだ。:
It's all right, Kanna... I can't eat from
dreams.

46484.「ごちゃごちゃ言ってねーで 早く来い！\n テメーらみたいな カビくせぇ木工職人:
Stop messing around and get your ass over
here! You're a bunch of moldy woodworkers who
can't even pay your own interest!

46487.「……アタシは 素材にも 道具にも\n カビなんて生やさせたこたぁ ありゃしない:
I would never allow mold to grow on my
materials or tools! I'm a proud craftsman!

46488.「アンタらこそ 今 自分のやってることに\n 誇りが あるってのかい！？\n 胸:
Are you proud of what you are doing? Are you
proud of your work? What?

46489.「キハダ！ アンタもアンタだよ！\n 借金が苦しいからって 一度抱いた夢を\n:
Kihada! You're just like you! You're a
pathetic man who abandoned his dream just
because he's in debt!

46491.「ちょ……ちょっと アニキ！\n ツバクロのアニキ～！！: Hey, Big brother! Tsubakuro's big brother!

46492.「なんじゃ 騒がしいのぅ。\n オメーらで ちーたぁ片付けぇや……。:
What's with all the noise? You guys better
clean up your mess...

46493.「ん んん！？\n ……もしや お嬢？ お嬢じゃろか？: Hm-mm! Is it... miss? Miss, is it?

46494.「おや 誰かと思ったら ツバクロじゃないか。\n ひさしぶりだね。:
Well, look who it is, Tsubakuro. It's been a
while.

46495.「フン……。一文無しで じいさんに拾われて\n ギルドの 使い走りしてたアンタが:
You, who were penniless and were picked up by
my grandfather to run errands for the guild,
now seem to be running a big ass business.

46496.「まぁいいさ。アンタなら 話が早いよ。\n これ 受け取ってくんな！ その代わり:
Well, that's all right. You're the fastest guy
I know. Take this! In exchange, you can clear
Kihada's debt.

46497.「こ……こりゃ スミツボのオヤジさんが\n 大事にしとった 家宝の木工刀じゃろ！:
This...this is pot's father's treasured
heirloom woodworking sword! I can't accept
such a precious thing!

46498.「今のアタシにとって 門弟よか\n 大事なモンなんて ないんでね。\n じいさん:
There's nothing more important to me now than
my students. I'm sure your grandfather will
understand...

46500.「まったく お嬢には かなわんのぉ。\n ……ほいじゃ こりゃあ\n わしが い:
I'm no match for the young lady. Well then,
I'll leave you to it for the time being.

46502.「キハダ！ そこの <pc>だって\n イチから コツコツ がんばってんだよ。:
Kihada! Even <pc> there is trying
hard from the very beginning.

46503.「もう <color_yellow><%sEV_SYOK_HOSI><color:
I've grown up to be able to make more than <%sEV_SYOK_HOSI> <%sEV_SYOK_ITEM> now. You should start working
on it tomorrow!

46504.「お嬢……。まるで スミツボのオヤジさんが\n 生き返ったかのようじゃったわ……:
Miss... it was as if Mr. Pot had come back to
life...

46505.「キハダさん。アンタのこたぁ 目をつむるけぇ\n 木工ギルドで働ける 幸せをかみ:
Mr. Kihada. I'll close my eyes to what you're doing... and just think how lucky you are to be working for the Woodworking Guild... and do
your job well...
